# core.functions.acosh { #optyx.core.functions.acosh }

```python
core.functions.acosh(x)
```

Inverse hyperbolic cosine.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                                                                  | Description                       | Default    |
|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------|------------|
| x      | [Expression](`optyx.core.expressions.Expression`) \| [float](`float`) | Expression or numeric value >= 1. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                        | Description                         |
|--------|---------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|
|        | [UnaryOp](`optyx.core.expressions.UnaryOp`) | Expression representing arccosh(x). |
